FuncDef:
The pki cmp session command creates a CMP session and displays the CMP session view, or displays the view of an existing CMP session.
The undo pki cmp session command deletes a CMP session. The pki cmp session command creates a CMP session and displays the CMP session view, or displays the view of an existing CMP session. The undo pki cmp session command deletes a CMP session. By default, no CMP session exists.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a CMP session.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-insensitive characters without spaces, double quotation marks ("), single quotation marks ('), asterisks (*), question marks (?), slashes (/), backslashes (\), or colons (:).

ExtraInfo: Before choosing CMPv2 for certificate application, run the pki cmp session command to create a CMP session. CMPv2 configurations are performed in the CMP session view.
